text:
Onu Technology, Inc. | CONTRACTORS, GRADUATE INTERNS, POSTDOCTORAL CONSULTANTS | ONSITE (Silicon Valley) or REMOTE

We are developing high-performance algorithms for truly big data and image processing, solving various deep challenges. We are currently open to engineers with solid experience in Python, Ansible, and React. We also welcome interest from postdoctoral scholars or senior graduate students with experience in any area of machine learning or H.P.C..

Contact info@onutechnology.com.
